verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6965"\w* David \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* Nob, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* Ahimelech \w the|strong="H0935"\w* priest: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Ahimelech \w was|strong="H3083"\w* full \w of|strong="H0935"\w* fear \w at|strong="H0935"\w* meeting David, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* said \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w*, Why \w are|strong="H3083"\w* \w you|strong="H0935"\w* \w by|strong="H0935"\w* yourself, having no man \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H0935"\w*?

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Ahimelech|strong="H0288"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w The|strong="H0559"\w* king \w has|strong="H0369"\w* given \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w orders|strong="H0559"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w has|strong="H0369"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w Say|strong="H0559"\w* \w nothing|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w anyone|strong="H0376"\w* \w about|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* business \w on|strong="H0413"\w* which \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w am|strong="H0905"\w* sending \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w orders|strong="H0559"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* given \w you|strong="H0859"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w certain|strong="H0376"\w* \w place|strong="H0935"\w* \w has|strong="H0369"\w* \w been|strong="H2729"\w* fixed \w to|strong="H0413"\w* which \w the|strong="H0559"\w* young \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* now, \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w here|strong="H4725"\w* five cakes \w of|strong="H4428"\w* bread, \w give|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* hand, \w or|strong="H0408"\w* \w whatever|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* priest, answering \w David|strong="H3027"\w*, said, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w no|strong="H4672"\w* common \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w here|strong="H6258"\w* \w but|strong="H6258"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* holy \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*; \w if|strong="H0176"\w* only \w the|strong="H5414"\w* young men \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w kept|strong="H5414"\w* themselves \w from|strong="H3027"\w* women.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w Certainly|strong="H3588"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w been|strong="H3426"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*; \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H0369"\w* \w been|strong="H3426"\w* \w done|strong="H3027"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w gone|strong="H0369"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w arms|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w were|strong="H0802"\w* \w made|strong="H0802"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w common|strong="H2455"\w* journey; \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w much|strong="H3027"\w* \w more|strong="H0369"\w* today \w will|strong="H0369"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w arms|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w made|strong="H0802"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w gave|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* bread: \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H0518"\w* other, \w only|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* bread \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* new bread might \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w put|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* \w place|strong="H6944"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H1961"\w* \w away|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* certain man \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w servants|strong="H8033"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Saul \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w kept|strong="H5414"\w* \w back|strong="H3947"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*; \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w name|strong="H0518"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* Doeg, \w an|strong="H1961"\w* Edomite, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* strongest \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Saul's runners.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H3117"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Ahimelech, \w Have|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* no sword \w or|strong="H3117"\w* spear \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w here|strong="H8033"\w*? \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* come without \w my|strong="H3068"\w* sword \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w other|strong="H0376"\w* arms, \w because|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* king's business \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* done quickly.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* priest \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Goliath \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Philistine, whom \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w put|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* death \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* valley \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Elah, \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w* folded \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* cloth \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w back|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* ephod: \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w*, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w other|strong="H6311"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*. \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w other|strong="H6311"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w*; \w give|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w got|strong="H3947"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* went \w in|strong="H5414"\w* flight \w that|strong="H0834"\w* day \w for|strong="H3588"\w* fear \w of|strong="H6010"\w* \w Saul|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* went \w to|strong="H0559"\w* Achish, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* king \w of|strong="H6010"\w* Gath.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* servants \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w* \w said|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w Is|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*? \w did|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w make|strong="H6965"\w* songs \w about|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* dances, saying, \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w put|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* death thousands, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* tens \w of|strong="H4428"\w* thousands?

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* took \w these|strong="H2088"\w* words \w to|strong="H0413"\w* heart, fearing \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Gath.

\w So|strong="H3966"\w* changing \w his|strong="H7760"\w* behaviour \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* seem \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w if|strong="H7760"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w off|strong="H0853"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w*, hammering \w on|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* doors \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* town, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* letting \w the|strong="H0853"\w* water \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6440"\w* go \w down|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* chin.

\w Then|strong="H0853"\w* Achish \w said|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* servants, \w Look|strong="H5869"\w*! \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w man|strong="H8179"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* clearly \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* head; why \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w let|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*?

\w Are|strong="H4100"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* not enough unbalanced \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w about|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H0935"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* let \w this|strong="H0935"\w* \w person|strong="H0376"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* such tricks \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*? \w is|strong="H4100"\w* such \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* house?
